articleBody:
UEFA President Čeferin: “Champions League games being played in USA? It's possible. We started to discuss about that”, told @MenInBlazers. 🏆🇺🇸

“In 2025, the final is in Munich… after that, let's see”. https://t.co/7T00qLik9e

Iván Fresneda on Arsenal interest: “I like Arteta a lot because I think he’s a great coach”, he told @TheAthleticFC. 🔴🇪🇸 #AFC

“I follow the European leagues, I think the work Arteta is doing with his club is fantastic”. https://t.co/f1wnGWFl5A

Official, confirmed. Evan Ferguson has signed new long term deal with Brighton valid until June 2028. 🔵🤝🏻 #BHAFC

De Zerbi: “This is an excellent news for us. The aim is to help Evan become one of the strongest strikers in Europe”. https://t.co/RN9qbyOsrw

Tottenham unveil Ryan Mason coaching staff until end of the season ⚪️ #THFC

Matt Wells (Acting Assistant Head Coach), Nigel Gibbs (Acting First Team Coach) plus Perry Suckling (First Team Goalkeeping Coach), Gianni Vio (Set Pieces Coach), who continue their existing roles. https://t.co/rJeZDPXqkF

Rafa Leão, performing at incredible level again this season. AC Milan are insisting and pushing to get new long term deal signed as soon as possible. 🔴⚫️🇵🇹

Leão, 100% focused on the pitch for key moment in Champions League and also Serie A. https://t.co/QcnotyLHIU

Pep Guardiola: “Nathan Aké won’t be available vs Arsenal. Hopefully he can come back soon”. 🔵 #MCFC

“Back vs Real Madrid? I don’t know... We will find the right player to do it, I don’t have doubts. We’ll play with 11”. https://t.co/KAp62BnMEj

Guardiola: “I remember Ødegaard, years ago… he came with his father for 2 days of training sessions [in 2014]. I needed 5 minutes to think: this kid plays good!”. 🇳🇴 #AFC

“He’s great player, really. Exceptional”. https://t.co/mumwKcSqM5

Understand Real Betis have now finally sealed the agreement with former Barça director Ramón Planes. He’s gonna be unveiled as new director — done deal, confirmed. 🚨🟢🤝🏻 #RealBetis

After long talks, Planes will be appointed with the club statement expected in the next days. https://t.co/2qoA7drVm2

Lampard on Mount: “New deal for him? Not my opinion. It will be the opinion of the club and the opinion of Mason, so that's between them”. 🔵⭐️ #CFC

“There’s no doubt, he’s top-class player. Trust me, it’s not easy to play with top players around and he’s managed to do that”. https://t.co/oczA2DJdny
japaneseVersion:
ランパード・オン・マウント：「彼にとってニューディール？私の意見ではありません。それはクラブの意見とメイソンの意見になるだろうから、それは彼らの意見だ。🔵⭐️ #CFC

「間違いない、彼はトップクラスの選手だ。信じてくれ。トッププレイヤーたちとプレーするのは簡単じゃないし、彼はなんとかそれを成し遂げた。」https://t.co/oczA2DJdny
